name: Laser Thief - A Mixed Reality Laser Game
summary:
Laser Thief

Laser Thief is a heart-pounding mixed reality game that brings laser-dodging heists straight to your living room! With three exciting game modes—Story Mode, Bomb Mode, and Free Play Mode—there’s always a new challenge around the corner.

Note: Laser Thief requires a minimum of 3x3 meters (approximately 10x10 feet) of space to play.
